amendment.description: Amendment required that a veteran small-business owner must be at least one of the people appointed to the advisory board overseeing the Small Business Innovation Research Program Grants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 110-603 to require a veteran small-business owner must be at least one of the people appointed to the advisory board overseeing the Small Business Innovation Research Program Grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gillibrand amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mrs. Gillibrand.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gillibrand amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
